name: St John's
description:
This is a men's button-up shirt made by St. Johns Bay in a size large. 
 The shirt is white, gray, and black in a plaid pattern and features a button-down collar, long sleeves with button-up sleeve cuffs, a full button-up front closure, a front pocket, and a round bottom hemline. 
 It measures approximately 22.5 from underarm to underarm, 21.5 from top of shoulder to sleeve opening, and 27.25 from the back of neck to bottom hemline when laid flat.
 This garment was made in Nicaragua of 100% cotton.
 The shirt comes in good pre-owned condition with rips and tears on the right sleeve.
